Rule.Filter: ([highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'road' or [highway]='service' or [highway]='living_street' or [highway]='pedestrian' ) and [bridge] >=''
([highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'road') and not [tunnel]>='' and not [surface]='unpaved'
([highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'road' or [highway]='service' or [highway]='living_street' or [highway]='pedestrian') and [bridge] >=''
([highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'road') and not [tunnel]>='' and not [surface]='unpaved'
([highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'road' or [highway]='service' or [highway]='living_street' or [highway]='pedestrian') and [bridge] >=''
([highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'road') and not [tunnel]>='' and not [surface]='unpaved'
( [highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] ='road' or [highway]='service' or [highway]='living_street' or [highway]='pedestrian') and [bridge] >=''
([highway] = 'primary' or [highway] = 'primary_link' or [highway] = 'trunk' or [highway] = 'trunk_link') and [length] > 3 and not [length] > 7
([highway] = 'primary' or [highway] = 'primary_link' or [highway] = 'trunk' or [highway] = 'trunk_link') and [length] > 3 and not [length] > 7
([highway] = 'primary' or [highway] = 'primary_link' or [highway] = 'trunk' or [highway] = 'trunk_link') and [length] > 3 and not [length] >7
([landuse] = 'cemetery' or [landuse] = 'grave_yard' or [amenity] = 'grave_yard' and not [religion]>'') or (([landuse]='cemetery' or [amenity]='grave_yard') and [religion]='christian')
([leisure] = 'pitch' or [leisure] = 'sports_centre' or [leisure] = 'golf_course' or [leisure] = 'track' or [leisure] = 'stadium') and not [sport]='tennis'
[highway]='residential' or [highway]='unclassified' or [highway]='minor' or [highway]='road' or [highway]='service' or [highway]='track' or [highway]='path' or [highway]='cycleway'
[landuse]='grass' or [landuse]='meadow' or [natural]='fell' or [landuse]='sand' or [landuse]='scree' or [landuse]='landfill' or [landuse]='allotments' or [landuse]='scrub'

Datasource.Parameter: (select * from planet_osm_line WHERE waterway is not null) as "cieki"
(select * from planet_osm_polygon where building is not null) as budynki
(select * from planet_osm_line WHERE highway is not null OR man_made='pier') as "sciezki"
(select * from planet_osm_line WHERE railway is not null OR aerialway is not null) as "koleje"
(select way,highway,name,ref,oneway,bridge,tunnel,surface,tracktype from planet_osm_line WHERE highway is not null) as "zjazdy"
(select way,highway,name,ref,oneway,bridge,tunnel,surface,tracktype from planet_osm_line WHERE highway is not null) as "drogi_lokalne"
(select way,highway,name,ref,oneway,bridge,tunnel,surface from planet_osm_line WHERE highway='tertiary' OR highway='tertiary_link') as "drogi_powiatowe"
(select way,highway,name,ref,oneway,bridge,tunnel,surface from planet_osm_line WHERE highway ='secondary' OR highway='secondary_link') as "drogi_wojewodzkie"
(select way,highway,name,ref,oneway,bridge,tunnel,surface from planet_osm_line WHERE highway is not null) as "drogi_glowne"
(select way,highway,railway,ref,oneway,route,type from planet_osm_line WHERE route is not null OR railway='tram') as "transport_publiczny"
(select way, highway, oneway, waterway, name, ref, char_length(ref) as length FROM planet_osm_line WHERE highway is not null OR waterway is not null) as "nazwy_drog"
(select way, name, population, place, capital, admin_level from planet_osm_point where place is not null order by population desc) as "miejsca"
